name: nodejs-typescript-example
description: Node.js + TypeScript integration test example using ket

scripts.cluster:restart: npm run cluster:stop && npm run cluster:start
scripts.cluster:fix-rbac: kubectl create clusterrolebinding ket-test-admin --clusterrole=cluster-admin --serviceaccount=ket-system:default --dry-run=client -o yaml | kubectl apply -f -
scripts.cluster:fix-rbac:all: kubectl create clusterrolebinding ket-cluster-admin --clusterrole=cluster-admin --group=system:serviceaccounts --dry-run=client -o yaml | kubectl apply -f -
scripts.setup: npm run docker:build && npm run cluster:start && echo 'Waiting for cluster to be ready...' && sleep 10 && kubectl cluster-info
